HR 19, an alternative w/ bipartisan provisions - The Lower Costs, More Cures Act of 2019 - will result in lower out-of-pocket spending AND protect access to new life-saving medicines and cures. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôd like to see HR 19 offered, debated, and voted on instead of HR 3. pic.twitter.com/w6hO1AgLVh

The Democratic bill, H.R. 3, would stifle innovation.
